title: Normalize ignore-region coordinates to viewport
description: Ignore-region rectangles are interpreted after resizing screenshots to the viewport, so small coords (e.g., 4x4) do not cover the rendered 1440x900 image. Need to normalize region coordinates to the viewport/screenshot size or accept normalized percentages so masking matches the intended area without giant rectangles.

title: Fix main.rs API mismatches blocking build
description: main.rs has API mismatches: (1) image_to_normalized_view signature wrong (takes &str not &Path), (2) figma_to_normalized_view takes &FigmaClient and &FigmaRenderOptions, not individual args, (3) FigmaRenderOptions.viewport should be Option. Blocking full binary build.

title: Update lib.rs re-exports after modularization
description: After all module splits are complete, update lib.rs to properly re-export all public APIs from the new module structure. Ensure backwards compatibility for external consumers of dpc_lib.

title: CLI UX scaffolding & graceful fallbacks (json/pretty outputs, progress hints, non-implemented gating)
description: Deliver user-friendly CLI UX scaffolding before full features land: (1) Non-implemented commands return structured JSON with status, message, and next-steps; pretty mode mirrors JSON fields; (2) Verbose runs show staged progress (parse args, detect resources, prepare capture, run metrics) even when stubbed; (3) Exit codes documented/consistent. This is a temporary but polished user-facing surface so the CLI feels premium while core features are built.
notes: Stub UX polished; docs examples added; compare tests green

title: Clarify generate-code/quality stubs
description: Emit explicit not_implemented summary with roadmap and next steps (use compare). Pretty mode should show human-friendly note; JSON keeps mode + topIssues. Keep exit 0. Add tests for stub messaging both formats.

title: Implement hierarchy heuristic for quality mode
description: Check for 2-3 distinct text size tiers (title/subtitle/body). Flag pages lacking clear visual hierarchy. Report missing hierarchy finding.

title: NormalizedView & Input Processing Pipeline
notes: All pipeline tasks done: URL->NV (pcu), Figma->NV (kyu), DOM snapshot (byf), image->NV (qpi), config/viewport unified (hgq/9kg), ignore/keep artifacts (qvv, zmj), CLI UX/errors closed. Closing epic.

title: Unify docs and status banner
description: Add status banner to README (compare partial; generate/quality stubs; capture requires Node/Playwright/FIGMA_TOKEN). Cross-link docs (reporting, metrics_overview, normalized_view, ci_cheatsheet, dev_setup). Ensure flags/behavior match current code; call out exit codes and mock env vars.

title: Implement Figma API client
description: Create Figma API wrapper: authenticate with personal access token or OAuth, fetch file by key, fetch frame nodes, export images with scale factor. Handle rate limiting and errors.

title: Implement pretty-print output format
description: When --format pretty, output human-readable summary: colored pass/fail, similarity score, top issues list, metric breakdown with colors. Use termcolor or similar for terminal output.

title: Set up clap CLI argument parsing
description: Configure clap v4 with derive macros for dpc binary. Define subcommands (compare, generate-code, quality). Implement global flags. Add shell completion generation.

title: CLI Commands (compare, generate-code, quality)
notes: CLI help/docs polished with examples; avoided main/output/tests

title: Extract DOM conversion to browser/dom.rs
description: Extract RawDomSnapshot, RawDomNode, RawComputedStyle, RawBoundingBox types and convert_raw_dom function from browser.rs to browser/dom.rs. ~300 LOC.

title: Finalize output/report contract (pretty & JSON parity)
description: Align output/report contract: ensure pretty vs json parity for CLI commands, error payloads, and artifact surfacing; update docs and tests accordingly.

title: Extract PixelSimilarity metric to metrics/pixel.rs
description: Extract PixelSimilarity struct and SSIM computation from metrics.rs to a dedicated metrics/pixel.rs module. Includes: PixelSimilarity impl, compute_ssim function, diff region clustering. ~500 LOC.

title: Figma image download uses unauthenticated reqwest::get
description: Figma client builds an authenticated reqwest client but download_image bypasses it with bare reqwest::get, losing headers/timeouts/proxies. If the signed image URL requires auth or tighter timeouts, downloads may fail silently. Fix by reusing the configured client with per-request timeouts and add tests for error propagation.

title: Define JSON output schema v0.2.0
description: Implement output struct matching spec: version, mode, ref/impl objects, viewport, similarity, threshold, passed bool, metrics breakdown with per-metric score and diffs, summary with topIssues. Serialize with serde_json.

title: Define core type definitions
description: Create types.rs with NormalizedView, DomSnapshot, FigmaSnapshot, OcrBlock, and all metric output structs (PixelMetric, LayoutMetric, TypographyMetric, ColorMetric, ContentMetric).

title: Implement --ignore-selectors flag
description: For DOM-based comparisons, exclude elements matching CSS selectors from metric calculations. Parse comma-separated selector list. Apply to layout, typography, content metrics.

title: Extract generate-code command to commands/generate_code.rs
description: Extract generate-code command stub from main.rs to commands/generate_code.rs. Currently a stub; separate module allows independent development. ~50 LOC.

title: Extract ContentSimilarity metric to metrics/content.rs
description: Extract ContentSimilarity struct from metrics.rs to metrics/content.rs. Includes text matching, missing/extra text detection. ~250 LOC.

title: Implement combined score calculation
description: Combine metrics: similarity = w_pixel*0.35 + w_layout*0.25 + w_typography*0.15 + w_color*0.15 + w_content*0.10. Handle missing metrics by redistributing weights. Implement configurable weights via CLI flags.

title: Extract core types to types/core.rs
description: Extract NormalizedView, ResourceKind, BoundingBox, OcrBlock from types.rs to types/core.rs. Core types used across all modules.

title: Extract Figma snapshot types to types/figma.rs
description: Extract FigmaSnapshot, FigmaNode, FigmaPaint, FigmaPaintKind, TypographyStyle from types.rs to types/figma.rs. Figma-specific normalized types.

title: Add core dependencies to Cargo.toml
description: Add essential crates: clap (CLI parsing), serde/serde_json (JSON), image (image processing), tokio (async runtime), thiserror/anyhow (error handling).

title: Implement dpc quality command (experimental)
description: Reference-free quality scoring with flags: --input, --input-type, --viewport, --output, --format. Compute heuristic score [0,1] plus findings (alignment, spacing, contrast, hierarchy). Label as experimental.

title: Extract resource normalization to pipeline/normalization.rs
description: Extract resource_to_normalized_view and mock_render_image_path from main.rs to pipeline/normalization.rs. Handles Image/URL/Figma resource â†’ NormalizedView conversion. ~200 LOC.

title: Add --config file support
description: Wire --config <file> to load defaults (viewport, threshold, timeouts, weights). Merge CLI overrides last; validate and error clearly on bad config. Document in README/ci_cheatsheet. Add a temp-file test for config parsing.

title: Generate top issues summary
description: Analyze metric diffs to produce human-readable topIssues array. Prioritize by severity. Examples: 'Main CTA button is shifted down by ~8px vs spec', 'Main header is lighter and smaller than Figma design'.

title: Output/report contract: define JSON schema, pretty mode, artifact path surfacing
description: Define and implement output/report contract: JSON schema for success (scores, diffs, artifact paths) and errors; pretty mode mirrors JSON; sample payloads documented. Surface artifact locations (screenshots/DOM/diffs) in verbose mode. Acceptance: documented schema version, CLI emits structured outputs, and users can locate artifacts easily.

title: Extract Figma API types to figma/api_types.rs
description: Extract FigmaNodeData, FigmaBoundingBox, FigmaTypeStyle, FigmaPaintData, FigmaColor, FigmaFile, FigmaDocument, etc. from figma.rs to figma/api_types.rs. ~200 LOC.

title: Figma figma_to_normalized_view ignores requested viewport dimensions
description: figma_to_normalized_view accepts an optional viewport but never uses it; returned NormalizedView width/height always come from the exported PNG dimensions, so callers cannot request a specific viewport or scaled dimensions. Respect the viewport or document that it is ignored, and add tests to lock behavior.

title: Error rendering UX: map DpcError to user-facing JSON/pretty with remediation
description: Error rendering UX: map DpcError into user-facing JSON/pretty with categories (config/network/figma/image/metric), remediation hints, and consistent exit codes. Integrate with CLI scaffolding so errors are friendly and actionable. Acceptance: same error renders consistently across formats with a suggested fix.

title: Add CLI exit-code integration smoke tests
description: Add small CLI-level integration tests to validate exit codes end-to-end: compare pass returns 0, threshold failure returns 1, fatal/config errors return 2. Use fixtures or minimal stubs (mock resources or temporary images) to avoid external dependencies. Document expected exit codes in test names and ensure coverage for JSON vs pretty output.
notes: CLI exit-code smoke tests implemented and passing

title: Capture pipeline UX: progress logging and timeout defaults in browser capture
description: Capture pipeline UX: provide a single capture helper that logs stages (browser launch, nav, network-idle, screenshot/DOM), honors Config timeouts, and returns user-friendly progress/errors. Coordinate with bd-a1o implementation and output schema so artifacts are surfaced. Acceptance: capture API yields clear progress logs and respects configured timeouts.

title: Implement resource type detection
description: Parse --ref/--impl values to detect: Figma URLs (figma.com with file key + node-id), HTTP URLs, local image paths (.png/.jpg/.webp/.gif). Extract FILE_KEY and FRAME_ID from Figma URLs.

title: Split types.rs by domain
description: Split the 278-LOC types.rs into domain-specific modules. Currently contains NormalizedView, DOM types, Figma types, and metric result types. Target: 4 modules under src/types/ for better organization as codebase grows.

title: Implement exit codes for CI integration
description: Exit 0 if passed (similarity >= threshold), exit 1 if failed. Exit 2 for fatal errors (network, API failures). Document exit codes for CI/agent integration.

title: Implement OCR text extraction via Tesseract
description: Use Tesseract (via Rust bindings or subprocess) to extract text blocks from screenshots when no DOM/Figma tree exists. Return OcrBlock[] with text content and bounding boxes. Only invoke when content metrics requested.

title: Split metrics.rs into modular directory structure
description: Split the 2747-LOC metrics.rs god module into a modular directory structure. This file currently handles all 5 metric implementations (pixel, layout, typography, color, content), scoring logic, issue generation, and image processing utilities. Target: 9 focused modules of ~200-500 LOC each under src/metrics/. This is the highest-impact split for parallelization.

title: Wire Config into CLI flags + optional config file; expose defaults and effective settings
description: Wire Config into UX: map metric weights/timeouts/viewport to CLI flags and optional config file; show defaults in --help; print effective config in verbose runs; merge config file + CLI with clear precedence. Coordinate with viewport-unify (hgq) so a single Viewport flows through capture/metrics. Acceptance: flags + config file produce one Config used end-to-end; users can see and override defaults easily.

title: Extract quality command to commands/quality.rs
description: Extract quality command stub from main.rs to commands/quality.rs. Currently a stub; separate module allows independent development. ~50 LOC.

title: Create Playwright browser management
description: Manage Playwright browser lifecycle: launch headless Chromium, handle viewport configuration, implement network idle wait with timeout, cleanup browser instances. Consider pooling for performance.

title: Add unit tests for each metric
description: Create unit tests for pixel, layout, typography, color, content metrics. Use fixture images and DOM snapshots. Test edge cases: identical inputs, completely different inputs, partial matches.

title: Implement diff region clustering
description: For pixel diffs, cluster adjacent 'hot' pixels into bounding box regions. Classify severity based on size and intensity. For layout diffs, generate regions for missing/extra/shifted/resized elements.

title: Improve error clarity & remediation
description: Map common failures to actionable messages: Playwright/Node missing (install hint), missing FIGMA_TOKEN/node-id/file-key, capture timeouts (suggest timeout flags), missing file/unsupported ext (list supported). Ensure JSON/pretty include hints; keep exit 2. Add coverage tests.

title: Extract issue generation to metrics/issues.rs
description: Extract generate_top_issues function and issue ranking logic from metrics.rs to metrics/issues.rs. ~200 LOC.

title: Add developer setup guide (tooling, tests, offline tips)
Set up GitHub Actions CI
description: Configure CI: cargo build, cargo test, cargo clippy, cargo fmt --check. Add badge to README. Consider release workflow for binary distribution.

title: Create config/options module
description: Implement configuration struct for: viewport (default 1440x900), threshold (default 0.95), metric weights, timeout settings. Support CLI flags and potential config file.

title: Implement DOM snapshot extraction
description: During URL rendering, extract: node tree (tag, attributes, text), bounding boxes in viewport coordinates, computed styles for key properties (font-family, font-size, font-weight, color, background-color, line-height).
notes: DOM snapshot extractor implemented; computed styles extended with display/visibility/opacity; tests added

title: Extract compare command to commands/compare.rs
description: Extract compare command logic from main.rs run() to commands/compare.rs. Includes the full compare workflow: resource parsing, view normalization, metric execution, summary generation, artifact handling, and output rendering. ~500 LOC.

title: Split main.rs into commands and pipeline modules
description: Split the 1370-LOC main.rs into focused modules. Currently handles CLI dispatch, resource normalization, ignore logic, diff heatmap generation, artifact persistence, and output formatting. Target: 7 modules under src/commands/ and src/pipeline/.

title: url_to_normalized_view returns opaque Playwright errors when npm module is missing
description: render_url maps the Playwright 'Cannot find module \'playwright\'' failure to an actionable config message, but url_to_normalized_view returns the raw JSON/exit text. Add consistent error mapping (and tests) so DOM capture path guides users to install playwright.

title: Soften metrics UX (layout fallback & issue ordering)
description: Layout metric should return low score + issue when impl has zero elements instead of hard error. Order generate_top_issues by severity/priority so palette shifts outrank minor typography. Add tests for new ordering and no-error layout fallback.

title: Extract DOM types to types/dom.rs
description: Extract DomSnapshot, DomNode, ComputedStyle from types.rs to types/dom.rs. DOM-specific types for browser rendering.

title: Extract ColorPaletteMetric to metrics/color.rs
description: Extract ColorPaletteMetric struct and k-means clustering from metrics.rs to metrics/color.rs. Includes: k-means algorithm, LAB color conversions, delta-E computation, palette extraction. ~500 LOC.

title: Implement Layout/Structure Similarity metric
description: Extract elements from DOM/Figma (buttons, headings, text blocks, images, inputs). Normalize coords to [0,1] relative to viewport. Build spatial relation graph. Greedy match elements by type, label, proximity. Score = 0.5*match_rate + 0.5*avg_IoU.

title: Polish pretty output (Stripe-level summary)
description: Redesign pretty output: status badge, similarity vs threshold, top issues (max 5), metric table, artifact paths. Default to pretty for TTY unless --format json; keep JSON unchanged. Add tests for human layout and artifact listing; file outputs stay plain.

title: Extract TypographySimilarity metric to metrics/typography.rs
description: Extract TypographySimilarity struct from metrics.rs to metrics/typography.rs. Includes font family/size/weight/line-height comparison logic. ~300 LOC.

title: Known issues & coordination runbook
description: Document current gaps (CLI stubbed, browser capture in progress, reservations expectations) and add a short runbook on using file reservations to avoid collisions.

title: Split browser.rs into modular directory structure
description: Split the 1049-LOC browser.rs into focused modules. Currently handles BrowserManager, Playwright scripts (inline JS), process spawning, timeout handling, and DOM conversion. Target: 4 modules under src/browser/.

title: Create metrics/mod.rs with trait definitions and orchestration
description: Create metrics/mod.rs containing: Metric trait definition, MetricResult enum, MetricKind enum, run_metrics orchestration function, default_metrics factory, and re-exports. ~200 LOC.

title: Extract artifact handling to pipeline/artifacts.rs
description: Extract persist_compare_artifacts, generate_diff_heatmap, write_json_pretty, resolve_artifacts_dir from main.rs to pipeline/artifacts.rs. ~200 LOC.

title: Write README and usage documentation
description: Document: installation, CLI usage examples for all 3 commands, configuration options, CI integration, exit codes, JSON schema reference, agent workflow example.

title: Add integration tests for compare command
description: Create end-to-end tests: image vs image comparison, mock URL rendering, Figma API mocking. Verify JSON output matches schema. Test threshold pass/fail logic.

title: Fix pretty output build & fallback
description: Add termcolor imports in src/main.rs; ensure colored pretty output compiles. When --output or non-tty, write plain pretty text; keep colors only for tty. Keep pretty errors on stderr with empty stdout. Add smoke test for plain-output path.

title: Extract LayoutSimilarity metric to metrics/layout.rs
description: Extract LayoutSimilarity struct from metrics.rs to metrics/layout.rs. Includes element matching algorithm, IoU scoring, position/size diff detection. ~400 LOC.

title: Initialize Rust project with Cargo
description: Create new Rust binary project 'dpc' with proper Cargo.toml structure. Set up workspace for potential future crates (lib + binary separation).

title: Create metrics trait/interface
description: Design pluggable metric interface: trait Metric { fn compute(ref: NormalizedView, impl: NormalizedView) -> MetricResult }. Enable selective metric execution via --metrics flag. Support future metric additions.

title: Unify viewport handling across CLI/config/types with early validation and single Viewport type
description: Unify viewport handling: one canonical Viewport type shared across CLI/config/normalized types; CLI eagerly parses WIDTHxHEIGHT with helpful errors and echoes the parsed viewport in verbose output. Ensure downstream capture/metrics receive the same Viewport instance. Acceptance: no duplicate viewport structs; invalid input surfaces actionable error; defaults remain 1440x900.

title: Add coverage for score aggregation and top issue ranking
description: calculate_combined_score and generate_top_issues lack unit tests for partial metric sets, zero weights, and severity ordering. Add focused tests to lock expected behavior (weights re-normalized over present metrics, issues sorted by severity, truncation respected).

title: Extract Playwright scripts to browser/playwright.rs
description: Extract PLAYWRIGHT_SCRIPT, PLAYWRIGHT_SCRIPT_WITH_DOM constants, run_playwright method, ensure_node/playwright_available, and error mapping from browser.rs to browser/playwright.rs. Consider also extracting JS to external files. ~400 LOC.

title: Document & validate ignore-regions
description: Update CLI help/README for JSON rectangle mask support; add example file and validation errors describing expected shape {x,y,width,height}. Ensure errors use exit 2 and clear messaging. Add tests for valid/invalid files.

title: Make artifacts discoverable
description: Always print artifact directory on success/failure (unless suppressed) and include paths in pretty summary. Ensure JSON artifacts block is populated. Add a hint for viewing diff/DOM snapshots. Add tests for artifact path presence.

title: Preflight check for Node/Playwright dependency
description: Our browser runner shells out to an embedded JS Playwright script (node -e ...), but we never verify that node and the playwright npm package are installed. When missing, users just see a generic config error from the helper. Add a preflight check (or friendlier error mapping) that detects missing node or playwright and surfaces actionable guidance; include tests/docs.

title: Extract figma_to_normalized_view to figma/conversion.rs
description: Extract figma_to_normalized_view, build_figma_snapshot, collect_figma_nodes, map_typography, map_bounding_box, map_paint from figma.rs to figma/conversion.rs. ~250 LOC.

title: Developer quickstart: build/test and environment requirements
description: Document how to build/test locally, required toolchain (Rust stable, Node/Playwright once capture lands), and basic cargo commands. Goal: reduce onboarding friction while core features are in flux.

title: Implement viewport parsing
description: Parse --viewport WIDTHxHEIGHT format (e.g., 1440x900). Validate dimensions. Default to 1440x900. Pass to rendering pipeline.

title: Implement Figma to NormalizedView conversion
description: Use Figma REST API to: fetch file and frame JSON, export frame as PNG at given dimensions, extract nodes with bounding boxes, text nodes with styles, fill colors, font family/weight/size.

title: Extract BrowserManager to browser/manager.rs
description: Extract BrowserManager struct, BrowserOptions, PageRenderResult, and semaphore-based concurrency from browser.rs to browser/manager.rs. ~300 LOC.

title: Split figma.rs into modular directory structure
description: Split the 822-LOC figma.rs into focused modules. Currently handles API types, figma_to_normalized_view conversion, tree building, and letterbox transforms. Target: 4 modules under src/figma/. Lower priority as figma_client.rs already provides some separation.

title: Implement Pixel/Perceptual Similarity metric
description: Use image-compare crate (SSIM) or dssim for perceptual similarity. Convert screenshots to common color space, compute metric normalized to [0,1]. Generate diff heatmap and cluster hot pixels into regions with severity levels (minor/moderate/major).

title: Implement URL to NormalizedView conversion
description: Use headless Chromium via Playwright to render web URLs at given viewport. Wait for network idle (configurable timeout). Capture PNG screenshot and DOM snapshot (node tree, bounding boxes, computed styles).
notes: ChartreusePond reports pcu complete; batch pushed and tests passing.

title: Detect missing Playwright JS dependency
description: When Node is present but the JS helper cannot require('playwright') (module missing), the browser runner returns a generic config error. Detect this specific failure (stderr from script) and surface a clear instruction to install Playwright npm package. Add test exercising the mapping.

title: Pretty error fallback goes to stderr
description: When write_output fails, render_error routes pretty output to stderr instead of stdout, so pretty JSON isn't available to callers. Adjust fallback to align with JSON branch or respect output flag.

title: Implement Image to NormalizedView conversion
description: Load local images via Rust image crate (.png, .jpg, .jpeg, .webp, .gif). Handle size normalization: scale impl to ref resolution, letterbox if aspect ratio mismatch. Support --no-resize option.

title: Implement --keep-artifacts flag
description: When enabled, preserve intermediate files: screenshots, DOM JSON snapshots, Figma JSON, diff heatmaps. Store in temp directory or specified output path.
notes: Completed: keep-artifacts implemented; ChartreusePond reports artifacts preserved via --keep-artifacts/--artifacts-dir with docs/tests.

title: Set up error handling infrastructure
description: Create error.rs with DpcError enum covering: IO errors, network errors, Figma API errors, image processing errors, metric computation errors. Implement proper error propagation.

title: Implement alignment heuristic for quality mode
description: Cluster x-positions of element left edges. Flag elements that deviate significantly from clusters. Calculate alignment score for quality mode findings.

title: Implement dpc compare command
description: Main comparison command with flags: --ref, --impl, --ref-type, --impl-type, --viewport (default 1440x900), --threshold (default 0.95), --metrics, --ignore-selectors, --ignore-regions, --format json|pretty, --output, --keep-artifacts, --verbose.

title: Implement dpc generate-code command
description: Code generation command with flags: --input, --input-type, --stack html+tailwind (MVP only), --viewport, --output. Wrap screenshot-to-code or equivalent LLM pipeline. Return code only, errors as JSON.

title: Extract letterbox transforms to figma/transform.rs
description: Extract LetterboxTransform, compute_letterbox_transform, finalize_figma_image, normalize_figma_snapshot from figma.rs to figma/transform.rs. ~200 LOC.

title: Implement contrast heuristic for quality mode
description: Approximate text/background contrast ratios. Flag low contrast elements that may fail WCAG guidelines. Report as quality finding with severity.

title: Implement Typography Similarity metric
description: For matched elements, extract font-family, font-size, font-weight, line-height. Map families to canonical groups. Compute penalties: family mismatch (high), size diff >10% (medium), weight category mismatch (medium). Score = 1 - clamp(weighted_avg_penalty).

title: Extract metric result types to types/metrics.rs
description: Extract MetricScores, PixelMetric, LayoutMetric, TypographyMetric, ColorMetric, ContentMetric and all related enums/structs from types.rs to types/metrics.rs. Result types for metric computations.

title: Resource detection UX: resilient type detection and actionable error messages
description: Improve resource detection UX: case-insensitive image extensions, file existence checks with helpful hints, clearer URL/Figma parsing errors, and remediation tips (e.g., add file://, correct node-id). Surface detected kind in verbose output. Acceptance: users get actionable errors and the detected resource type is logged; no silent mis-detections.

title: Implement spacing heuristic for quality mode
description: Analyze gaps between neighboring elements. Cluster spacing values. Flag outliers when 5+ distinct vertical spacing values detected. Report inconsistent spacing findings.

title: Generate diff heatmap image
description: Create visual diff image highlighting pixel differences. Save as PNG alongside JSON output when --keep-artifacts. Use color coding for severity (green minor, yellow moderate, red major).

title: Implement quality mode output format
description: For dpc quality command, output: version, mode, input object, viewport, score, findings array with severity (warning/info), type (alignment_inconsistent, spacing_inconsistent, low_contrast, missing_hierarchy), message.

title: Docs & samples: premium-grade CLI guidance and walkthroughs
description: Premium docs & samples: concise, Stripe-quality CLI guidance for compare/generate-code/quality with end-to-end examples, sample outputs (JSON/pretty), config flags, artifact locations, and troubleshooting (timeouts, resource detection, missing node-id). Acceptance: a short doc users can follow to run a parity check confidently with expected outputs shown.

title: Extract ignore logic to pipeline/ignore.rs
description: Extract apply_dom_ignores, apply_ignore_regions, load_ignore_regions, selector matching from main.rs to pipeline/ignore.rs. ~200 LOC.

title: Extract scoring logic to metrics/scoring.rs
description: Extract ScoreWeights struct and calculate_combined_score function from metrics.rs to metrics/scoring.rs. ~150 LOC.

title: Implement Color Palette Similarity metric
description: Extract dominant colors via k-means clustering in Lab color space. Compare pairwise distances between major colors. Calculate overlap of palette coverage by area. Optionally cross-check Figma color tokens vs CSS custom properties.

title: Implement Content Similarity metric
description: Extract text strings from DOM, Figma, or OCR. Normalize whitespace, case, punctuation. Fuzzy match strings for headings/labels. Compute fraction matched, penalty for extra large strings. Return missingText[] and extraText[].

title: Implement --ignore-regions flag
description: Load JSON file with manual bounding boxes to exclude from pixel comparison. Format: [{x, y, w, h}]. Mask regions before computing pixel metric.
